body_html: Try the one-earlier release of Bazel 0.2.3 or whatever it is. 0.3 never worked for me. Rolling back twice worked for me on Ubuntu 16 and 14, with same exact CUD* versions. Make sure bazel 0.3 is uninstalled, obviously.
